Title: Shakan
Lore: Sagyndym seni

Title: Camel Explorer
Description: You can explore one more time when in a Desert or a Plain.

Title: Baqsı
Lore: « The Baqsı is a traditional healer, fortune-teller and community adviser. »

Title: Qusbegi
Lore: « Golden eagles do not get trained easily. Without hardships, there won’t be a good eagle. »

Title: Uriankhai
Description: Always efficient against Commoners.

Title: Mongol Villagers
Description: +1 Speed in Plain.

Title: Kazakh Herders
Description: While in a plain, halves all incoming damage.
Lore: « jilki – jelden, siyir – sudan, tuye – shölden, eshki – tastan, koy – peyishten jaralgan »

Title: Kalmyk
Description: Comes with Buddhism. Has the additional Slavic culture if you have at least 1 Slavic adventurer in your group.
Lore: « The sky is copper,  Without any light. »

Title: Steppes Rider
Description: When Steppes Rider defends, its attacked must damage one Commoner card from his hand or group.

Title: Qañğy
Description: +1 Cultural range while in plains. Can use Religious skills in plains.
Lore: « You will pass six rivers, but you will not be able to pass the seventh. »

Title: Tengrikut
Description: Non-fighting Religious have +1 Life.
Lore: « Ba Chinggis Khaany urguud ooriin Mongoljin toroor aj shilamd orvoos ba esvees beer gagts Monh Tenger med hemeej. »

Title: Wataugan
Description: While in Mountain, generate 1 Gold whenever you attack.  +1 attack against Native.

Title: Draftee
Lore: « Chop chop! »

Title: Cowboy
Lore: « Lichen, mistletoe, aloft  In the dying croft,  Leaf the winter trees. »

Title: Renegado
Description: +1 Skill slots per other adventurer without Talent. This is not a Talent.

Title: Frontiersman
Description: +1 Speed in Forests and Mountains. Can't receive damage from animals.
Lore: « And all'd otherwise be but the murmur of wind and the clop of snow from an overloaded branch. »

Title: Highwayman
Description: When someone else uses a Noble or Intellectual skill, they must pay 1 Gold.

Title: Pistolero
Description: +1 attack per discovered Region.

Title: Bounty Hunter
Description: Bounty Hunter is also considered a Quest.

Title: Minuteman
Description: +1 Speed to Gunpowder adventurers.

Title: Jaguar Warrior
Description: Exhaust Tracker.  Observe the enemy map.

Title: Toltecatl
Description: This adventurer can learn an unlimited number of passive skills. Has the additional Iberian culture

Title: Merchant
Description: You can avoid a fight by paying X cards where X is the number of enemy adventurers.
Lore: « When Jupiter rose, he gave the brush. For a price. »

Title: Sacrificer
Description: If you have Paganism, using a Religious deals 1 damage to the opponent.
Lore: « Look at my eyes. Look. »

Title: Tracker
Description: Exhaust Tracker.  Observe the enemy map.

Title: Chaski
Description: +2 speed in Mountain. Has the additional Explorer type.
Lore: « Some of them are, and you can't touch them. »

Title: Native Villagers
Description: Remove building restrictions while in Forest.

Title: Arabian Villagers
Description: Arabian villagers can learn Soldier skills if you have the Islam religion.

Title: Fellah
Description: Whenever the enemy adds an item to its group, you may directly attack this player.

Title: Mujahid
Description: Furtivity.  Double its attack in Mountains.  Can use Soldier skills if you have Islam in your group.
Lore: « La ‘izza illa bil-jihad fi sabil Allah »

Title: Gaziya
Description: You can refresh an exhausted Skill instead of paying Gold.
Lore: « Their dancing has little of elegance ; its chief peculiarity being a very rapid vibrating motion of the hips, from side to side. »

Title: Badawi
Description: +2 speed in Deserts. If you have Islam, Badawi gains the Arab culture.  If you have an Ottoman, Badawi gains the Ottoman culture.
Lore: « nasnfisten ya kleb 'afnen mahabbeh  l-ajen suwari saghen bil 'igabi »

Title: Imam
Description: Comes with Islam.

Title: Sariq
Description: This adventurer may use Outlaw skills from your hand.

Title: Kemet Zealot
Description: Can use any number of Outlaw skills during your turn.
Lore: « ḥtp-ḍỉ-nśwt wśỉr ḫnty ỉmntjw ncr ɗɹ nb ɹbc̣w wp-wɹwt nb tɹ c̣śr »

Title: Mameluke
Description: Other Arabs have Echo for Soldier skills.

Title: Mugharrarin
Description: When you take an instance of damage, you may explore 1. This amount is doubled if Islam is in your group.
Lore: The descendant of an Andalusian seafarers family from Lisbon, who are said to have never stopped wandering the world, in their quest for discoveries.

Title: Aakuaksrak
Description: For each Female without a Male in your group, grants +1 HP.

Title: Urangai Sakha
Description: Spend 1 Knowledge to grant to Archery specialty to another Adventurer.
Lore: « Ilinten arğaa ol kustuga,  Almaas taas kurduk sandaara sırdıır. »

Title: Mongrel
Description: You can Explore at Night.
Lore: « Is it for ye wolde have my queynte allone?  Wy, taak it al! Lo, have it every deel! »

Title: Arctic Villagers
Description: Your group is immune to Weather damage.
Lore: « The girl had to braid sinews for holding up trousers and the boy, Kaujjarjuk, had to chop blubber to make oil for the lamps. »

Title: Inuit
Description: Effects that triggers or are affected by the Night get affected by the Day instead.
Lore: « But virtue, that silently toils or expires  No wreath for the brow to entwine  That asks but a smile, but a fond sigh requires »

Title: Pirka Menoko
Lore: « rai heneya - mokor heneya - a-e-kon ramuhu - shitne kane - tanak kane »

Title: Saami
Description: You can attach Animals on Saami. Animals attached this way can be used as Gold, Knowledge, or spent to search for Commoner skills.  +1 attack per Animals attached.

Title: Noaidi
Description: Double your Observe at night.
Lore: « Ågå niråma buårebåst, nute åtzån sargabåst.  Taide sun monia lij aigåmasz sarågåin uålgatamasz. »

Title: Hajduk
Description: Your adventurers have 1 additional Skill slot.
Lore: « Docekujem Sarajlije mlade  Te otimam i srebro i zlato  I lijepu cohu i kadifu »

Title: Betyár
Description: +X to your hand limit, where X is the number of Skills and Items attached to this adventurer.
Lore: « Jó estét, csárdásné! Hát ez a két pej paripa ki-é? »

Title: Gypsy
Description: +2 Inventory slots.  Comes with Hinduism, Islam or Christianity.  When you Refresh Gypsy, you may Observe 1.
Lore: « Káy me yákh som, Ac tu ángár,  Káy me brishind som, Ac tu pâni! »

Title: Greek Refugee
Description: When you reach 8 Knowledge, search for 1 Legendary adventurer and replace it with Greek refugee, keeping all skills and items attached.
Lore: “Like the sweet apple which reddens upon the topmost bough,  Like the wild hyacinth flower which on the hills is found... »

Title: Anchorite
Description: Experience can be consumed to evolve adventurers.
Lore: « Who are we to destroy the mysteries of the night »

Title: Vlach
Description: Vlach can use Outlaw skills at Night.
Lore: « Vad cum iese soarele  Ale, ale, ale »

Title: Pandur
Description: All Balkan adventurers’ signature skills are shared.  When you attack, you may search for a Musical skill (once per turn).
Lore: « Auch ist, mit seiner Heldenschaar, Der Held Schwerin nicht fern.  Wir sehen ihn; Sein graues Haar,  Glänzt uns, als wie ein Stern! »

Title: Sarakatsani
Lore: « Their rootlessness was balanced by an elaborate ritualization of almost every aspect of their lives, from costume to the moral code. »

Title: Stradiot
Description: +1 attack per Exhausted adventurer in the group.
Lore: « Estradiots, au son de leurs bedons,  Courent chevaulx, font bruire leurs guidons,  Saillent en l’air, vont de si roide sorte,  Qu’il semble bien que tempete les portes. »

Title: Narentine
Description: Comes with Paganism.
Lore: Descended from the unbaptized Serbs, they refused the civilisation, and thus turned to piracy.

Title: Uskok
Description: Your Group Class is Errant Company while you are in Mountains.
Lore: « Stojan reprit le chemin de Kotari, Emmenant avec lui la fille turque ;  Il la fit baptiser, et l’épousa, L’aima fidèlement, et la rendit heureuse. »

Title: Domnitor
Description: You may decide to convert 1 Commoner, Soldier, or Slave of your group into a Impaled Corpse Structure.  This structure can be exhausted once per turn to Fear the opponent’s attacker.
Lore: His lank dining fellows, some lullful branchless boles,  Slowly drying their drips, Of countless previous feasts.

Title: Bosniaken
Description: +1 Cultural Range

Title: Schiavone
Lore: Viva San Marco!

Title: Armatole
Description: You can always Embush as long as the enemy has at least one Ottoman adventurer.  If you have an Ottoman noble, Armatole gains the Soldier type.
Lore: « ν'άποτελέσουν τήν μαγιά της λευτεριάς »

Title: Imbangala
Description: Rage (+1 Attack per Damage)
Lore: « But when they take any town they keep the boys and girls of thirteen or fourteen years of age as their own children. But the men and women they kill and eat. »

Title: Shaman
Description: Comes with Paganism.
Lore: « It seems that the woman was perceived as being in a close relationship with these animal spirits. »

Title: African Villagers
Description: Comes with Paganism.
Lore: Of a heterogeneous composition comes a homogeneous material.

Title: Slave Hunter
Description: +1 damage when attacking Slaves.

Title: Tufuhen
Description: +1 damage when attacking Slaves.

Title: Witch Doctor
Description: You can attach up to 2 Passive Skills on Quests.  Witch Doctor can’t learn Passive Skills.
Lore: « Let no joyful voice be heard!  Let no man look up at the sky with hope.  And let this day be cursed  by we who ready to wake...” »

Title: African Slaves
Description: When African Slaves is targeted, you may search for a Cimarron.

Title: Cimarron
Description: When Cimarron attacks, you can remove the Slave type of 1 Adventurer from any player and grant him the Outlaw type.
Lore: « Et, debout sur ces monts qu'il prenait à témoins,  Souvent il s'écriait : je suis libre du moins ! »

Title: Quilombola
Description: +1 Food in Forest.  Your Slave adventurers gain +1 Life per Slaves in your group.
Lore: « Eu, pássaro-preto, cicatrizo queimaduras de ferro em brasa,  fecho corpo de escravo fugido e monto guarda na porta dos quilombos. »

Title: Adviser
Description: If you don’t discover a Skill in your exploration, you may explore again.
Lore: To see in the day, open your eyes.  To see in the night, close them.

Title: Cho-ko-nu
Description: Can use Gunpowder skills as Archery skills.
Lore: « Huà lóng diǎn jīng »

Title: Xiangu
Description: If no Gunpowder skill are available, Xiangu can use Archer skills
Lore: « She would come and go,  Ascending and descending. »

Title: Arquebusier
Lore: « Zhǐ shàng tán bīng »

Title: Haidao
Description: If you hand is empty, you may attack.
Lore: « She was a sapling thin woman of sleepy eyes and caries-riddled smile. Her oiled black hair shone brighter than her eyes. »

Title: Chinese Villagers
Description: When you add this adventurer to your group, you can search for any adventurer from your map and add it to your group.
Lore: « I remember... years ago… he was standing in front of a blue gate. »

Title: Nóngmín
Description: When you add an Adventurer to your group, heal 1.

Title: Manchu
Description: +1 attack to Archery skills. Using an Archery skill allows you to use a Mounted skill for free.
Lore: « Sabdara tampin emgeri cingkatala,  Sinci usacuka jilgan elben i boo de isinjiha. »

Title: Shaolin Master
Description: Your unarmed attacks can never miss.
Lore: « Is it possibIe using kung fu to pIay cards? »

Title: Treasurer
Description: You can pay with cards of your map instead of Gold.
Lore: « Huǒ zhōng qǔ lì »

Title: Youxia
Lore: « A decade long I honed a single sword, Its steel-cold blade still yet to test its song. »

Title: Xiangmazei
Description: Applies Fear when attacking.

Title: Philosopher
Description: Can't equip weapons.  +1 Knowledge when you camp two times in a row.
Lore: « The weak overcomes the strong.  The soft overcomes the hard. »

Title: Gisaeng
Description: Each time you camp, you can attach an additional Intellectual skill to Gisaeng.
Lore: « and roll by roll, when my frozen love returns, I will unfold it to the night »

Title: Blind monk
Description: Comes with Buddhism.

Title: Perkenier
Description: Nanyang commoners of the group have the additional Slave type.
Lore: « The perkeniers were entitled to a specified number of slaves, necessary to work the land, maintain the trees, weed, and to harvest and process the nutmeg and mace. »

Title: Stadhouder
Lore: « Da oben? Ach so... da oben. Wunderschön war es da oben. Nur sehr weit weg von zu Hause. »

Title: Envoy
Description: When you use an Explorer skill, Observe X, where X is your Speed.
Lore: A hat-wearing fishmonger?

Title: Handelaren
Description: Commoners cost Gems instead of Food.

Title: Vrijbuiter
Description: You can have an additional active Quest.
Lore: « Breng mij die horizon! »

Title: Trekboers
Description: Comes with Covered wagon.
Lore: I see vacant immensities  beyond boundaries.  It waits.

Title: Kommando
Lore: Like... tears. In rain.

Title: Diakentje
Description: You can attach up to 1 Luxury to each of your Adventurer.
Lore: « Uit later tijd stammen een miniatuur met een diakentje op de dedicatie-bladzijde. »

Title: Musketeer
Description: When Musketeer defends, you may use a Melee skill from your hand.
Lore: « Klockius so deeply hath sworn ne'er more to come  In bawdy house, that he dares not go home. »

Title: Piratebane
Description: +2 attack against Pirates.
Lore: « Wave Tamer, conveyor of civilisation to barbaric lands. »

Title: Redemptioners
Description: Comes with 1 Mount.  You may attach a Slave skill to Redemptioner, granting him the Slave type.
Lore: « Nice day for fishing, ain’t it? »

Title: Spy
Description: At night, exhaust Spy.  You can use a Skill from the enemy group.
Lore: « These are the magic. These are the vision. The rest is only Poetry. »

Title: Flag Bearer
Description: When exhausted, is considered a Structure. Items and Passives attached are still in effect.
Lore: « Meddling brat! Your hand is in everybody’s pie! »

Title: Highlander
Description: Refresh Highlander at the end of your turn without the need of Camping.  +1 attack if you have a French adventurer.

Title: Wanton
Description: At the price of 1 damage, change the type of this adventurer (any types).
Lore: « Thus, it will be seen, their life, for all its splendour, was not without danger and difficulty, requiring talent and determination for success. And required them to live a wandering and disconnected life. »

Title: Doctor
Description: When you refresh Doctor, you may Heal 1.
Lore: The joy of freedom compensates for many injuries.

Title: Gallóglach
Description: Get the additional Scandinavian culture in coastal regions.
Lore: Unstoppable descendants of Vikings and Gaels from the northern islands of Britannia.

Title: Reiver
Lore: « Idonea, wolves  Are not the enemies that move my fears. »

Title: Redshank
Description: Gain 1 Gold when Entdecker attacks a Native or Ameridian adventurer.
Lore: A bare-legged and bare-footed Scottish mercenary.»

Title: Miner
Description: You can use Gunpowder skills to build structures instead.

Title: Captain
Description: +1 Attack for each different Specialty in the group when you attack with this adventurer.
Lore: « You French fight for money, while we fight for honour! »

Title: Fossicker
Description: Your Gold is worth double in Marsh.

Title: Admiral
Description: Exhaust Admiral. Admiral can 1 Soldier or Intellectual skill from your hand.
Lore: « Our destinies have been entwined, but never joined. »

Title: Bregaund
Description: All attached skills on this adventurer are considered Signature skills.
Lore: « Briganderie is a relative condition. »

Title: Paladin
Description: Comes with Holy Quest.  +2 Speed if you have Christianity.
Lore: « Un homme sans son frère est un dos sans défense. »

Title: Huguenot
Lore: Bon, on tourne l'éponge ?

Title: Hospitalier
Description: Exploring a new region or building a new structure heal 1, or 2 if you have Christianity.
Lore: « Autour des colonnes roses, jaillies vers leurs larges chapiteaux, les jours actuels se pressent et bourdonnent. »

Title: Interprète
Description: Comes with Linguistics.  Savages have -1 attack.
Lore: « Fier d’avoir vécu et souffert dans d’autres que moi-même. »

Title: Mousquetaire
Description: Is Melee against Mounted.
Lore: « Ah, sangdieu ! il ne m’échappera pas, cette fois. »

Title: Sans-Gêne
Lore: Her tongue was like a cloud ; once set in motion, you never knew when she would stop.

Title: Echevin
Description: Any Intellectual skills attached to any Commoner adventurers is considered a Signature skill.
Lore: « Il n’y a jamais de commencements. Les jours s’ajoutent aux jours sans rime ni raison, c’est une addition interminable et monotone. »

Title: Camisard
Lore: « Gens du peuple qui ne possèdent ni équipement ni armement militaire, ils portent lors de leurs combats de simples chemises. »

Title: Savoyen
Description: Gains the Outlaw type in Plains.  Damaging with a Melee skill also Fear the target.
Lore: « Pè onna nai qu’étive la pe naire  I veniron; y n’étai pas pè bairè;  Y étivé pè pilli nou maison,  Et no tüa sans aucuna raison. »

Title: Fille du Roy
Description: Your French male adventurers get +2 Life, double this amount if they have the Commoner or Soldier type.
Lore: « 1500 livres de dot en avancement d'hoirie dont 1000 en deniers comptants, et le reste en trousseau, habits, etc... »

Title: Corsair
Description: The target of Corsair is considered Outlaw for the rest of the day.  Corsair is considered a Pirate for other groups.
Lore: « Chacun se bat pour ce qui lui manque. »

Title: Flibustier
Description: +2 attack against Spanish.
Lore: « Ce que l’esprit français offre de meilleur : le goût du panache plutôt que de la puissance. »

Title: Goliard
Lore: « Oh, totus floreo, iam amore virginali, totus ardeo, novus, novus amor est, quo pereo. »

Title: Courtisane
Description: Gain 1 gold whenever you or the other player(s) discover a Noble adventurer.
Lore: « Bois, bois du vin et ne t’abandonne jamais au chagrin de ce monde. Ceux qui y viendront après toi n’en deviendront que trop tôt la proie. »

Title: Cuirassier
Description: Gets +X attack where X is the number of French adventurers in the group.
Lore: « Ô transport d''un cœur glacé ! Rêve effacé ! Ces bottes-là c’est tout notre passé ! »

Title: Menestrel
Description: You may refresh 1 adventurer when you use a General skill.  Menestrel can use all Musical skills and they don’t take up Skill slots.
Lore: « Seignor, oies chanson de grant nobilité,  Toute est de voire estoire sens point de fauseté,  Jamais n’orres si bonne en trestout vostre aé. »

Title: Outcast Magister
Description: Can use Soldier skills.

Title: Voyageur
Description: When you Explore, heals X where X is the number of cards discovered.
Lore: « Their Latinate voluptuousness combines with their Gallic laziness. »

Title: Vivandière
Description: +2 Life to your other adventurers.  +1 Life healed when Camping.  Vivandière represents 2 Food.
Lore: « Da müßt sie mit dem Regiment,  Nach Frankreich, überall mit hin,  Und wär die Marketenderin. »

Title: Coureur des bois
Description: You can add Animals in your hand.  Animals in your hand don’t count for the hand limit.
Lore: « Au coin de l'âtre ou je tisonne  En rêvant à je ne sais quoi,  Petit grillon, chante avec moi,  Qui, déjà vieux, toujours chansonne »

Title: Uhlan
Description: Harass (add a Hit card each time you consecutively attack with this adventurer this turn).

Title: Black Rider
Description: +1 attack for each Adventurer with Point Blank in the group.
Lore: « Dahin mit dir, möcht’ ich mit dir,  O mein Geliebter, ziehn,  Dahin mit dir, möcht’ ich mit dir »

Title: Alchemist
Description: Comes with Lapis Philosophorum (Quest).  When you discover a Gem, you can search for 1 Item.
Lore: « The vertue of our Stone few men can tell,  The Elements in him be so mighty,  Aboundance of treasure in him do dwell;  For in riches all Stones exceeds he. »

Title: Pioneer
Description: Mounts provide one additional Inventory slot.
Lore: ...winding up with tangling all the mules pretty well in the harness, the escape of the leaders...

Title: Apothecary
Description: When you discover a Plant, you may search for 1 Skill.
Lore: « Put your hand down, you silly girl." »

Title: Entdecker
Description: Gain 1 Gold when Entdecker attacks a Native or Ameridian adventurer.
Lore: « Wa aber das nicht und sy sich meiner angebotner freündschafft widern thette, wölle ich ihnen nachstellen, auch sie, ihre landt und veldgebew. »

Title: Jaeger
Description: Can learn and use any animal-related skill.

Title: Bürgermeister
Description: When you camp, you can use two times an Intellectual skill of your choice.

Title: Landsknecht
Description: If you don’t have Gold, this adventurer can use Outlaw skills, and they don’t take up Skill slots.
Lore: Mach nur deine Augen zu, denn meine sind nun endlich offen.

Title: Inhaber
Description: You can have as many Soldier type skills in your hand.  You can use Soldier skills from your hand.
Lore: « Ich hör deine Stimme nicht; Mir ist, als ob ein Rauschen im Wald Von alten Zeiten spricht. »

Title: Schiffskinder
Description: Adds +1 Logistic for each adventurer with the same Signature skill.
Lore: « Einsam auf blauer Wasserwüste ein Segelweißes Schiff sich wiegt. »

Title: Knecht
Description: Knecht can be attached as an Item to a Noble adventurer.

Title: Nibelungen
Description: When another player finds a Legendary card, you may search for a Legendary card.
Lore: « Of this hero I sing, how fair he grew. Free he was of every blemish. »

Title: Rodelero
Description: +1 Attack for each Adventurer without Talent. This Talent is not a Talent.
Lore: The perfect soldier to conquer a new world.

Title: Conquistadora
Description: Each time your group is attacked, you can search for an Iberian adventurer.
Lore: « Señora, ¿de qué manera los tengo yo de matar? Respondió ella: Desta manera. Y desenvainando la espada los mató a todos... »

Title: Inquisitor
Description: You may directly attack the opponent whenever he uses a Religious skill even if Inquisitor is exhausted.

Title: Conquistador
Description: Can only target Natives.  +2 attack against Native.  When Conquistador dies, discard 1 Knowledge
Lore: In the dream  there is a sun  that never sets.

Title: Almogavar
Description: When you attack with Almogovar, the opponent may spend 1 Gold. If he does so, Almogovar attacks your group instead.
Lore: « Desperta ferro! »

Title: Bandeirante
Description: Other Nobles of your group gets the Deep Exploration signature skill.
Lore: « Onde as rajadas de luz nos rendemos. »

Title: Buccaneer
Description: +1 attack per Quest.
Lore: « To act on selfish impulse.  You want to see what it''s like.  One day, you won''t be able to resist. »

Title: Sometent
Description: While in Mountains, you get +1 hand limit for each Unarmed adventurer on the board.
Lore: « Eho! »

Title: Piquero
Description: d

Title: Priest
Description: When Priest uses a Religious skill, Heal 1.

Title: Missionary
Description: Comes with Christianity.

Title: Señor
Description: Can learn as many Noble skills as you have Noble skills or adventurers in your group.
Lore: And went, as people say,  Adventuring their way.

Title: Miquelet
Lore: « Por tu mucha inconstancia, Yo te comparo  Con peseta que corre, De mano en mano »

Title: Naturalist
Description: Plants and Animals discovered can directly be added to Knowledge.

Title: Navigator
Description: When you discover a Region, you may search for another Region and use it instead after having put back the previous one in your map.

Title: Escultora
Description: Gain 1 Knowledge when you discover a Landmark.
Lore: A young, ambiguous-looking stone carver who became artist against all odds.

Title: Prince
Description: Prince is passively exhausted. When you gain Gold, you may refresh Prince for the rest of your turn.
Lore: Thank you?

Title: Devadâsî
Description: Has the additional Intellectual type.
Lore: « Decorate the whole city with strings of pearls. Maintain the multicoloured canopy and wave the fly-whisk. »

Title: Brahmin
Description: Comes with Hinduism.
Lore: « You will find no rest for the long years of Eternity  For you killed a bird in love and unsuspecting. »

Title: Roma Slaves
Description: Roma Slaves can have Echo for Commoner and Slave skills.

Title: Bhāt
Description: Can be attached to a Noble adventurer. The non-Indian Noble adventurer can gain the Type of any other Indian adventurer from your group.
Lore: « Every royal clan depends on a line of bhāt for its recognition. »

Title: Sherpa
Description: +3 Inventory slot while in Mountains.

Title: Mughal
Description: When you have at least one Persian, Indian, and Altaic in your group, skills with these ethnic requirements can be used without restriction by these adventurers.
Lore: « The world is a bridge: but on the other side, no one is home built. »

Title: Sikh Akali
Description: Comes with Sikhism.
Lore: « One shall be forever blessed, who says God is the ultimate truth! »

Title: Dacoit
Description: You gain 1 Gold each time you the opponent add an Adventurer to his group.
Lore: « Ek vishesh prakaar kee dakaitee hotee hai »

Title: Scholar
Description: When you have Islam and Hinduism religions in your group, this adventurer may generate 1 Knowledge per turn.
Lore: « A fronte praecipitium a tergo desertio... »

Title: Karhade Queen
Lore: « The most dangerous of all Indian leaders. »

Title: Pindari
Description: Gain +10% Speed when using an Outlaw skill.
Lore: « Devastation, disruption, plunder. »

Title: Thuggee
Description: When Thuggee attacks, you and the defending player must pay 1 Gold.

Title: Astronomer
Description: +X speed at Night, where X is your Knowledge.
Lore: The sun is always beautiful in the night.

Title: Architect
Description: Construction time is halved, for a minimum of 1.
Lore: « Il meglio e l'inimicò del bene. »

Title: Avvoltoio
Lore: La redditività a volte prende svolte... sorprendenti.

Title: Musician
Description: You can attach a Musical skill to any skill in your group. Whenever you use this Skill, the music Skill is also used.
Lore: « Sta piovendo nella mia memoria, ma stasera fa un po freddo. »

Title: Cartographer
Description: +1 Region size per discovered Region.
Lore: « The afterglow touches the far traveler's hair,  He shed the worries carried in his hands. »

Title: Explorator
Description: Exhaust Explorator. Explore X, where X is the number of Exploration cards in your group.
Lore: « You have to go away for a long time... many years... before you can come back and find your people. »

Title: Elmetto
Description: +X attack where X is your Gold.  Elmetto can't get refreshed by Camping.

Title: Diplomat
Lore: « Tanto Nomini Nullum Par Elogium »

Title: Sediario
Description: You may attach this adventurer to a Religious adventurer as a Mount, doubling his skill and item slots.
Lore: « E fatica! fatica! Il sediario dovrebbe spazzare la chiesa, lavare i vetri, spolverare tutto, e si scarica su Pasquale mio. »

Title: Swiss Pikeman
Description: You can Defend with exhausted Adventurers.

Title: Sentinel
Description: +1 Attack per Structures in your current region.

Title: Tekiya
Description: +1 Inventory space per Luxury in the active Region.

Title: Smuggler
Description: Exhaust Smuggler instead of paying 1 gold.  Merchants who sell Items can also sell skills for the same price.
Lore: Many men left behind their lives to seek fortunes at sea.

Title: Ninja
Description: Active talents of your group can be used twice at Night.
Lore: Androgynous, dissenting, iconoclastic, feminine and at the same time very powerful, graceful and brutal.

Title: Ronin
Lore: « 100 years of sleep,  fallen in a slumber so deep. »

Title: Eshi
Description: Every 7 days, produces a [Woodblock Print] with random affixes.
Lore: It is said that he was married to a former prostitute from whom he gained an insider's understanding of the world of pleasure women.

Title: Aruki Miko
Description: You may Exhaust Miko or 1 of her skills to explore 1.
Lore: « And the more severe it is, the more creative it is. »

Title: Monk
Description: When you don’t attack during your attack action, you can explore 1 and heal 1.
Lore: « Jihatsu-tekide mujakide asobigokoro no aru »

Title: Onna-bugeisha
Description: Can’t be targeted by Gunpowder skills or Gunpowder attack.
Lore: « If the moon indeed has drifted down from the heavens,  Surely then the sky must be a little obscure. »

Title: Wokou
Description: Your Outlaw skills also count as Gold, and can be spent as Gold.
Lore: « Will fool their eyes, With friendly guise  Hollow their chests, So fear could nest »

Title: Kabukimono
Lore: « The sounds of bells, on a windless night. »

Title: Daimyo
Description: Share the effects of items attached on Daimyo to other Japanese adventurers.
Lore: You have to believe that this idea is so strong that even reality cannot contradict it.

Title: Dominican Nun
Description: Your Japanese adventurers can learn Religious skills regardless of any limitation.
Lore: « Lord, why are you always silent? »

Title: Soldadera
Description: Your women can learn Soldier skills.

Title: Rotos
Description: This Adventurer gets the talent (or non talent) of its attacker until it get attacked again.

Title: Machetero
Description: +2 speed in Forest.

Title: Marinero
Lore: La necesidad de tener una tripulación eficaz y la imposibilidad de obtener hombres que todos tuvieran buenos antecedentes.

Title: Saqueador
Lore: Bloodthirsty and depraved, also intellectually diminished.

Title: Laksamana
Description: Has the additional Noble type.
Lore: « A flying rug for Do, a telescope for Re, and a whistle for Mi. »

Title: Headhunter
Description: d
Lore: « Ngayau. »

Title: Pardoned Convict
Description: Your other Outlaw adventurers get the additional Unarmed speciality.
Lore: He fought hundreds of times,  to finally earn his freedom.

Title: Girl of Joy
Description: When you attack with Girl of Joy, enemy pays 1 Gold.
Lore: « Is it tucked? What the fuck is this? »

Title: Inong Balee
Description: When you use an Outlaw skill, you may Heal 1.

Title: Smith
Description: Melee adventurers of your group have +1 attack.
Lore: Grand-grandson of a boatman, he named his daughter after the pier where his mother was born.

Title: Congaï
Description: When you hire this adventurer, you can search for another Nanyang adventurer.
Lore: « Khiem frémissait, cinglée par chaque mot, mais elle ne pleurait plus, orgueilleuse, et recevait les insultes, le buste dressé, comme méprisante. »

Title: Batak wisata
Lore: « Ai ise do goarmu? »

Title: Farrier
Description: Mounts attached to Farrier are also considered as Item (so Farrier can have multiple mounts).

Title: Wrestler
Description: All Unarmed skills don’t take up Skill slots.

Title: Ieiàtase
Description: Exhaust Tracker.  Observe the enemy map.

Title: Bird of Passage
Description: When you discover an Event, you may search for another Event from your Discovery pile.

Title: Oneida Prowler
Description: Exhaust Tracker.  Observe the enemy map.

Title: Hunter
Description: The target of Hunter is also considered an Animal.

Title: Loremaster
Description: Discovering or completing a Quest generates 1 Knowledge.
Lore: « Alone, it's just a journey. Now adventures, they must be shared. »

Title: Warchief
Description: Your other Native adventurers can use Soldier skills and gain +X Life where X is the number of Natives in your group.

Title: Wangara
Description: Your Gold can be exhausted once to pay.
Lore: « Ones who engage in trade and travels from one horizon to another. »

Title: Emir
Description: Your Commoners and Slaves also count as Gold.

Title: Shifta
Description: Your adventurers can use Commoner skills regardless of ethnic or specialty restrictions.

Title: Eso Ikoyi
Lore: « Eso ki igba Ofa lehin  Afi bi o ba gbogbe niwaju gangan. »

Title: Dahomey
Description: All your female gain the Soldier type while being attacked.
Lore: Ahosi, Gbeto, Mino, Amazon.

Title: Anṣār
Description: d
Lore: A Sufi warrior from Sudan, also known by the name of Dervish.

Title: Caravaner
Description: All your adventurers have 1 additional Inventory slot.
Lore: « La zra na bal zra ta laar shta. »

Title: Berber Nomads
Description: Building desert structures doesn’t necessitate camping.

Title: Ògún Warrior
Description: +1 attack per other Sudanese adventurer in your group.
Lore: « Ògún elémono eran ahùn ni je,  mákindé ti dogun leyin odi »

Title: Maigadi
Description: +1 attack per adventurer with the Noble type.

Title: Debtera
Description: Comes with Christianity.  Can use any Paganist skills regardless of limitations.
Lore: « Then I created the talisman and included the shaved eyebrows of the hyena in the scroll by using the hyena skin. Then I give it to the patient. »

Title: Sultan
Description: When you attach an Religious skill, you may search for a new Signature Skill for Sultant.

Title: Janissary
Description: +1 Attack per other Ottoman in group.

Title: Azap
Description: +1 Speed per adventurer with Archaic combat to your adventurers with Archaic combat.

Title: Saboteur
Description: Unarmed adventurers can use Intellectual skills.

Title: Yezidi
Description: +1 Attack for each religious skills attached to Yezidi.

Title: Excavator
Description: You can directly access to level 2 of landmarks.
Lore: « They might relate to some kind of ritual, but we need to dig deeper to get a better understanding. »

Title: Pasha
Description: Luxury can be used as experience.

Title: Odalisque
Description: +1 Life to other Slaves of your group.  Female Slaves get double this amount of there is an Ottoman Noble in your group.
Lore: « That’s the task I’m hoping for, because once I can read I’ll be able to write you letters, Mamma. Does that not sound perfect? »

Title: Agha
Description: Comes with 1 Slave and 1 Intellectual adventurer.
Lore: A turk lord whose knowledge is as vast as his wealth.

Title: Bashkir
Description: While in attack, gain the Outlaw type.  +1 Attack against Slavic adventurers.
Lore: « Шуға күрә шишмәнең Аты була атаҡлы,  Даны китә артылып Тауҙың үренә саҡлы. »

Title: Fedayee
Description: +10% Poison damage
Lore: « Kumun şırıltısı duyulduğunda arkanı kolla. »

Title: Ghizai
Description: First hit is always critical.
Lore: « زه دلته ښه یم »

Title: Persian Villagers
Lore: « The garden’s heart shall not swell under the sun nor forget its green moments. »

Title: Jazayerchi
Description: +1 critical hit chance per speed malus.
Lore: « An arrow cannot answer a Jazāyer. »

Title: Engineer
Description: This adventurer gets +X Skill slots where X is your Knowledge.
Lore: « Dar bahaar, man gaahi oghaat miravam va dar labeye yek zamine goldar mineshinam. »

Title: Qurchi
Lore: « kälginläyü aqtïmïz, kändlär üzä čïqtïmïz, furxan ävin yïqtïmïz »

Title: Qalandari
Description: Comes with Islam.
Lore: « O my lady, I am an old man and a stranger and sore troubled by thirst. Wilt thou order me a draught of water, and win reward in heaven? »

Title: Ayyar
Description: +2 attack when you have taken more damage than your opponent.

Title: Ghulam
Description: Deals 1 damage to your opponent when you use a Slave skill.
Lore: « Tazıya tut deyir, dovşana qaç »

Title: Qizilbash
Lore: The name 'qizilbash' means 'red head' which refers to their crimson red conic headwear and is a symbol of their allegiance to Shia Twelver Islam.

Title: Basmachi
Description: If you have Islam, using a Outlaw skill heals 1.
Lore: « Er karu — bes kary »

Title: Conspirator
Description: Can use Noble skills from the enemy.  +1 Critical at night.
Lore: « In times of troubles, one can’t know who is who. »

Title: Putešéstvennica
Description: When you discover an adventurer whose Culture is not present in your group, you may generate 1 Knowledge.

Title: Inventor
Description: Comes with 1 Material and 1 Item.
Lore: « And the evil spirits lifted him and his ballon higher than the birch. »

Title: Pomors
Description: +1 Cultural Range
Lore: « Mossy rifts in weathered stones  Meekly vernal waters yield »

Title: Kobzar
Description: Comes with 1 Musical skill.
Lore: « У регіоні майже немає рівної землі, тому дерева навчилися рости де завгодно. Деякі навіть навчились рости в небі. »

Title: Kitezhian
Description: You can have an additional Group Class.
Lore: The last thing they saw was the shining dome of the cathedral with the cross on top. Then there were only waves.

Title: Strelet
Description: +2 attack against Asian units.

Title: Cossack
Description: Omnifighter. Harass (+1 per consecutive turn you attack with this adventurer).

Title: Concubine
Description: You can attach Gold to Concubine.  Attached Gold can’t be lost from external affect.
Lore: « Me, Priest’s daughter from Bohuslav  I have turned Turkish and infidel  For the sake of Turkish luxury  And because of miserable greed! »

Title: Starets
Description: Comes with Poustinik (structure). Starets consume no resource.
Lore: « А наипаче во время молитвы надлежит поставить ум свой в такое состояние, чтобы он был и глух и нем, как сказал Нил Синайский. »

Title: Ataman Marauder
Lore: « Богатырь ты будешь с виду  И казак душой.  Провожать тебя я выйду,  Ты махнёшь рукой... »

Title: Wayfarer
Lore: « Get out of here, adventurer. »

Title: Polyanitsa
Description: Double her attack against males.  Can fuse with Pole knight.
Lore: « You’ll always be mine.  Always...  and never. »

Title: Boyar
Description: When you refresh another Noble adventurer, you may search for a Resource card in your map.
Lore: « Primeln entblühen dem Rasen im Mai,  Achtlos jaget der Tartar vorbei. »

Title: Yamshchik
Description: +20% Speed per number of active Quests.
Lore: « Мне некуда больше спешить, Мне некого больше любить, Ямщик, не гони лошадей. »

Title: Cicerone
Description: Generates 10% more Knowledge per Noble adventurers in the group.
Lore: « Non saprai cosa non sapevano. Devi indovinare. »

Title: Vesna
Description: Each time this adventurer attack, heals 1. This amount is doubled if Vesna takes damage.
Lore: « Что с нею? Что с моей душой? С ручьем она ручей, И с птичкой птичка! с ним журчит, Летает в небе с ней! »

Title: Promyshlennik
Description: When you discover a Tribe, gains 1 Knowledge.
Lore: Russians and indigenous Siberian contract workers who engaged in the Siberian, maritime and later the Russian American fur trade.

Title: Snapphane
Description: Deals double damage against Scandinavians, Nobles, and Soldiers.

Title: Karoliner
Description: Having the Gunpowder specialty provides +1 damage to melee skills used by these adventurers.
Lore: Vi drar hem nu och så healar och sen så pushar vi mitt, okej?

Title: Skogarmaor
Description: While in a forest, +1 Attack per other Outlaw in your group. You can discard Animals as bonus damage.
Lore: Fate is a choice that never leads to regret.

Title: Exile
Description: Omnifighter. You may discard Exile. When you do so, inflict 5+X damage to the enemy, where X is the number of Scandinavians in your group.
Lore: « Yirð mina elsku hreina og heita, sem himni er meira skyld en grund og heim til himins. »

Title: White Slaves
Lore: The palaces of Algiers are full of exotic splendors from the remotest places of the world.

Title: Karelian
Lore: « Hevijannu karskeinkin nahkahousut sottais. »

Title: Spaewife
Lore: « Oh, I wad like to ken—to the beggar-wife says I—; Why chops are guid to brander and nane sae guid to fry. »

Title: Hierodule
Description: When Hierodule defends, you may use a Slave or Religious skill.
Lore: « Et monter lentement, dans un immense amour, De la prison terrestre à la beauté du jour »

Title: Cannibal Rider
Description: Your Religious skills deal +1 damage.

Title: Papar
Description: Explore 1 when using an Religious skill.
Lore: Centuries ago, forced to flee Iceland when the Vikings came, guided by faith, they reached the New World before the first Europeans.

Title: Antique General
Description: Other single-type Soldiers of your group gain +1 Attack.
Lore: « For a long while the battle, evenly poised exceeding gallantry. »

Title: Hwarang
Lore: « 사군이충, 사친이효, 교우이신, 임전무퇴, 살생유택 »

Title: Thalamako
Description: The damage inflicted by Thalamako are Observed by the attacking player.
Lore: « And since that time their ancient eloquence, their screaming notes, their tiresome zeal of speech have all remained. »

Title: Pirate Lord
Description: +1 attack per Cultural Range
Lore: His hair produces smoke, without us understanding how. But somehow, we knew why.

Title: Tocharian
Description: You can’t attack, but when you use an Intellectual or an Explorer skill, your opponent takes X+1 damage, where X is the number of Artifacts attached to Tocharian.
Lore: A lone wanderer carrying the legacy of a bygone civilization.

Title: Barbary Rover
Description: Can enslave any Intellectuals and Commoners.

Title: Wretch
Description: When Wretch is discovered, put it back to the library and shuffle again.
Lore: « Early wither of simmered wills and wasted prides, The citadel, whose gleams quaver in the flat depths. »

Title: Aboriginal
Description: Omnifighter. Comes with Boomerang (item).
Lore: « Ngul'leejee gawinjee mullinda  Gunalyee niong'gajee. »

Title: Voïgna
Lore: Haughty, contemptuous, insolent, gifted.

Title: Preceptor
Description: You may exhaust Preceptor, providing 1 free Knowledge during the turn.
Lore: Incsou & Crapivy

Title: Pole Knight
Description: When Pole Knight defends, Pole Knight can attack.  Can fuse with Polyanista.

Title: Winged Hussar
Description: Dismounted adventurers +2 Life and can learn any Musical skills.
Lore: « One of the most eye-skeweringly hardcore associations of asskickers ever assembled. »

Title: Chronicler
Description: You may choose to generate Knowledge from your Gold instead.
Lore: All those moments would be lost in time.

Title: Wędrowiec
Description: d
Lore: « Podumaj, potęsknij nad pomnikiem sławy. Dzieje twojéj ziemi na grobowcach czytaj. »

Title: Hussar
Description: Gains the additional Germanic culture in Age 2 and the Latin culture in Age 3.
Lore: « Any hussar who is not dead by the age of thirty is a blackguard. »

Title: Szlachcic
Description: Settlers have -1 Life but Region has +1 Food for for each Settler on it.
